title: Issue with Google Mail site
content:
So I just cleared my cookies and Cache for my web browswer since Youtube looked like it was having some kind of issue, and when I went to go sign into my email, I got a very odd message. I signed in as usual, but I got a 400 error message, saying the server can't process the request because it's malformed. I have no idea what's going on here. I'm using version 110.0.1 of Firefox. Just updated earlier yesterday and up till fifteen minutes ago, everything was working fine. What happened?!

I'm including a screenshot of what I'm seeing. Please help!
creator: Marc7

title: Historico, marcadores, favoritos e palavras passe
content:
Boa noite, gostava de tirar uma duvida. Eu formatei meu computador e vendi pois comprei um novo. Ao instalar o firefox no meu novo macbook, fiz login com minha conta do firefox, porem nao tem nada das minhas informacoes e dados do meu perfil do computador antigo. Ou seja, sumiu todo o historico, marcadores e palavras passe.

Como fa√ßo para recupera-los?

Ja fiz esse procedimento ano passado quando formatei o computador, porem desta vez nao aparece nada.

Na foto tem apenas as 2 credenciais que fiz login agora no computador novo.

Obrigada.
creator: franiahoffmann

title: Shorter/slower tab scrolling distance.
content:
The scrolling of tabs from left to right using the mouse wheel is way faster than I want. One scroll of the mouse wheel moves the tabs like 80% of the way across the tab-bar. This is problematic when the browser window is sharing half the screen and a scroll moves all visible tabs away. This means I have to then click the buttons to move the tabs one-at-a-time and if I click too fast it scrolls an entire pages worth which is also unwanted.

TLDR: I want a setting like `mousewheel.default.delta_multiplier_y` that only works in the tab-bar.
creator: siph

title: "Open Link in New Tab" auto closes tab immediatly when in Private Browsing Mode
content: If I open a private window and then right click on any link and choose the "Open Link in New Tab" context menu option, a new tab will appear for a few milliseconds before immediately closing and the link will never load. The new tab closed in this manner will not show up in the history of closed tabs either (likely because this list is only updated after a tab fully loads a page before being closed, which obviously never happens). I have not added any new addons since long before this problem started, but I did try disabling any tab related addons to no effect.
creator: 700_Tnega_Terces

title: Freezing issue while playing videos
content:
In this current update 110 and so on, I am facing issue of freezing and very high cpu and memory consumption. It happens when I play multiple videos in different tabs. The problems starts when I uses video pop up option and adds 4-5 videos on the screen. I reformatted the windows but problem still persist.

my details: Windows 11 22 H2 CPU is I7 8th generation and 8 GB RAM. Website is Youtube, IPTV Websites and online TV Channel website like Photocall.tv
creator: win.ent
